metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3699 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: John Lim ADOdb Library for PHP 5.11 allows remote attackers to obtainsensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, which revealsthe installation path in an error message, as demonstrated bytests/test-active-record.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: libphp-adodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
